title: With prior approval of the Director of Town Planning, Maharashtra State, Pune; the Authority / Collector may include other items of public interest in the list which are not covered in the above list
clause_text: With prior approval of the Director of Town Planning, Maharashtra State, Pune; the Authority / Collector may include other items of public interest in the list which are not covered in the above list.
